Hi 20-40, Thx for the upload. I heard the bluray contains a short called Tron: The Next Day that bridges the 2 films. Is that included in here?
@the_shroud: Just a movie, my friend. Otherwise, I would mention an inclusion...
Good movie - but GREAT movie @ imax (sound + expanded picture)

Well, five mouths in my family have 76 cents per day for food (when we pay our bills). Tickets to cinema costs approx. 4,2 bucks, per capita of course. I cannot leave my house (almost bed-ridden). So, your "great" turns into "fuck the pirates - give your money to Holly-Bolly, they need it more than you". That equals to "Fuck you twentyforty", right?
OK, much thx anyway. Sorry for late reply, been offline for a while. Still grateful I can get back on unlike those in Japan. My thoughts to victims of the Tsunami
i want to seed this can some one explain to me how i can do it please?
